properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 2:18PM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake Effect Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Snowfall rates
may reach 1 inch per hour briefly around daybreak on Thursday.

* WHERE...Monroe county. The greatest snow amounts are expected
along Lake Ontario and to the south and east of Irondequoit Bay.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited
visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
